ygData.subject: RE: What resolution do you all play at?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I had been playing in 1024x768 with Voodoo 3 until Kunark. I just got a new system with geforce yesterday, and I am back to highest resoultion. What is
ygData.messageBody:
> i bought a second monster 3d II back in beta3 just so i could play in full
> screen 1024x768, and have never played in any other res. i just turn that
> display option to not switch resolutions for my inventory screens. was
> lagging in this res before i got my new RoK system, but the geforce ddr-dvi
> (as well as everything else being new) helped enormously.
>
> Shada

I had been playing in 1024x768 with Voodoo 3 until Kunark.
I just got a new system with geforce yesterday, and I am back to highest resoultion.

What is this about dispay option for inventory screens?


Maravana Vireo
51 Bard of Jus Divinum
Mithaniel Marr
